title: Hurry, time's a wastin! // TYPOPHILE FILM FEST CALL FOR ENTRIES
content:
Just a friendly reminder that we are looking for YOUR amazing typographic films to showcase at the 4th annual Typophile Film Fest, premiering this year in Seattle during TypeCon.

All the detailed information for submissions is located here: [http://www.typophile.com/filmfest4](http://web.archive.org/web/20080314221417/http:/www.typophile.com/filmfest4 "http://www.typophile.com/filmfest4")

The deadline is approaching fast — Tell your friends! Write about it on your blog! Program a reminder into your mobile device!

 [‹ Looking for Font/Colour Suggestions](http://web.archive.org/web/20080314221417/http:/typophile.com/node/34337 "Go to previous forum topic") [Geometric Sans, c. 1500? ›](http://web.archive.org/web/20080314221417/http:/typophile.com/node/34420 "Go to next forum topic")
author: Zara Evens

comments.content: Bringing it back to the top, people :)
